Detailed Description

This class provides encoding/decoding of Base64 streams.

Member Function Documentation

bool Base64::decode ( const std::string &  inData,
std::string &  outData 
) [static]

This method decodes the base64 string in inData and puts the result in outData.

On failure, outData may be in a bad state.

Returns:
True on success, otherwise false.
